nodes.text: The Feast of Prosperity was an event organized by the Hutt Cartel during a galactic conflict, between the Sith Empire and Galactic Republic.

The Feast of Prosperity was a lavish banquet organized by two rising Hutts, Gaboorga and Duuba, during the Third Galactic War between the Sith Empire and Galactic Republic. The Hutts organized the feast to mend the declining reputation of the Hutt Cartel and aimed at advancing their own business interests by masquerading as a charitable event for the galaxy's poor.

Although the Feast could return the Cartel to its previous glory, Gaboorga and Duuba undermined each other's efforts due to conflicting interests, requesting the aid of third parties to help them in their goals.
The Feast of Prosperity is an annual event introduced in the update 6.1.4 to the Onslaught expansion of Star Wars: The Old Republic.
